item.name: comp Name of the current JIT compiler
comp Accumulated time spent in compilation
gc PS MarkSweep number of collections per second
gc PS MarkSweep accumulated time spent in collection
gc PS Scavenge number of collections per second
gc PS Scavenge accumulated time spent in collection

trigger.expression: {SCUO JMX Java:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=Compressed Class Space",Usage.used].last(0)}>({SCUO JMX Java:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=Compressed Class Space",Usage.max].last(0)}*0.7)
trigger.name: 70% mp Compressed Class Space used on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {SCUO JMX Java:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=PS Eden Space",Usage.used].last(0)}>({SCUO JMX Java:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=PS Eden Space",Usage.max].last(0)}*0.7)
trigger.name: 70% mp PS Eden Space used on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {SCUO JMX Java:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=PS Old Gen",Usage.used].last(0)}>({SCUO JMX Java:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=PS Old Gen",Usage.max].last(0)}*0.7)
trigger.name: 70% mp PS Old Gen used on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {SCUO JMX Java:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=PS Survivor Space",Usage.used].last(0)}>({SCUO JMX Java:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=PS Survivor Space",Usage.max].last(0)}*0.7)
trigger.name: 70% mp PS Survivor Space used on {HOST.NAME}
70% os Opened File Descriptor Count used on {HOST.NAME}
gc PS Mark Sweep in fire fighting mode on {HOST.NAME}
mem Heap Memory fully committed on {HOST.NAME}
mem Non-Heap Memory fully committed on {HOST.NAME}
mp Code Cache fully committed on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {SCUO JMX Java:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=Compressed Class Space",Usage.committed].last(0)}={SCUO JMX Java:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=Compressed Class Space",Usage.max].last(0)}
trigger.name: mp Compressed Class Space fully committed on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {SCUO JMX Java:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=PS Eden Space",Usage.committed].last(0)}={SCUO JMX Java:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=PS Eden Space",Usage.max].last(0)}
trigger.name: mp PS Eden Space fully committed on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {SCUO JMX Java:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=PS Old Gen",Usage.committed].last(0)}={SCUO JMX Java:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=PS Old Gen",Usage.max].last(0)}
trigger.name: mp PS Old Gen fully committed on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {SCUO JMX Java:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=PS Survivor Space",Usage.committed].last(0)}={SCUO JMX Java:jmx["java.lang:type=MemoryPool,name=PS Survivor Space",Usage.max].last(0)}
trigger.name: mp PS Survivor Space fully committed on {HOST.NAME}
